episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 1 - The Glorious Purpose
episode.description: Loki is captured by the TVA after escaping with the Tesseract. He learns about the Sacred Timeline and sees his tragic future. Mobius offers him a mission to stop a dangerous variant‚Äîhimself.

episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 2 - The Variant
episode.description: Loki works with the TVA to track a rogue variant. Their investigation leads to a confrontation with Sylvie, a Loki variant, during a timeline ambush. She escapes through a time portal, with Loki following her.

episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 3 - Lamentis
episode.description: Loki and Sylvie are stranded on the doomed moon Lamentis-1. They team up to find a power source to escape while learning more about each other. As the apocalypse nears, their survival hangs in the balance.

episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 4 - The Nexus Event
episode.description: 'The Nexus Event' revolves around significant developments in the storyline where Loki and Sylvie confront the TVA's true nature. In this episode, they face the consequences of their actions, leading to a pivotal moment that alters the course of the timeline and reveals deeper connections between the characters.

episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 5 - For All Time - Always
episode.description: This episode marks the climax of Loki's journey as the God of Mischief, with the fate of the Sacred Timeline hanging in the balance. The season finale features an epic showdown between Loki and the Time Keepers, with the very fabric of reality at stake.

episode.name: Loki Season 1 || Episode 6
episode.description: In episode 6 of Loki, the God of Mischief and his variant face their greatest challenge yet as the fate of the Sacred Timeline hangs in the balance. The season finale features an epic showdown between Loki and the Time Keepers, with a thrilling clashits and powers of w that will decide the future of the universe.
